means: 需要专门知识（或技术）的
以专家身份研究（或检查），像专家那样研究（或检查）
做专家工作，担任专家，成为高手（或能手）
Expanded Pert (program evaluation and review technique) 性能评价审查技术
expanded program evaluation and review technique 扩充式计划评审技术

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些形容词都有"熟练的"之意。
means: expert ： 特指有某项专长，有某方面经验。
proficient ： 多指擅长于某事，侧重技艺或科学方面。
skillful ： 指在工作或操作中表现出灵巧、熟练。
skilled ： 通常指已掌握某行业的专业技能或手段，或已有从事某一专门工作的本领或技术。

word_mean: 预测比赛结果的分析家

sentence.Network_en: You'll also get expert advice on keeping your hair in good condition.
sentence.Network_cn: 你还会获得有关如何保持良好发质的专家建议。

sentence.Network_en: I'm a limited and obtuse clergyman while you're the expert.
sentence.Network_cn: 你是专家，而我是个能力有限的愚笨牧师。

sentence.Network_en: His papers were proof against all but the most expert of scrutinies.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的论文几乎可以经受住最专业的审查。

行字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 行几〖 whichbrotherareyou?〗 行家〖 expert;connoisseur〗 行距〖 rowspacing〗.

list.abs: 专家证人（Expert witness）是指由一方当事人委托的具有相应专业知识和实践经验的专家就某些专门性问题在法庭上运用专业知识发 …
3D max9 快捷键 （转） ... .Update During Spinner Drag( 微调控制项拖动时更新) .Expert Mode( 专家模式) Modifiers( 修改工具栏).
experts say autism is permanent and cannot be cured., 专家说孤独症是永久的而且不能被治愈.
专家意见（expert opinion），或称专家证词（expert testimony）、专家证据（expert evidence），顾名思义，即是指上述专家应当事 …

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English (as an adjective): from French, from Latin expertus, past participle of experiri 'try'. The noun use dates from the early 19th cent. Compare with experience and experiment

entry.def: An expert is a person who is very skilled at doing something or who knows a lot about a particular subject.

example.ex: Our team of experts will be on hand to offer help and advice between 12 noon and 7pm daily.
example.tran: 每天中午12点到下午7点，我们的专家小组将随时提供帮助和建议。

entry.tran: 技术娴熟的;熟练的;在行的
entry.def: Someone who is expert at doing something is very skilled at it.

example.ex: The Japanese are expert at lowering manufacturing costs...
example.tran: 日本人在降低制造成本方面很在行。

example.ex: There is a great deal to learn from Hal's expert approach.
example.tran: 从哈尔熟练的方法中可以学到很多。

entry.def: If you say that someone has expert hands or an expert eye, you mean that they are very skilful or experienced in using their hands or eyes for a particular purpose.

example.ex: When the horse suffered a back injury Harvey cured it with his own expert hands...
example.tran: 那匹马背部受伤后，哈维用他内行的双手把它治好了。

example.ex: The symptoms are very mild and it takes an expert eye to see them.
example.tran: 症状非常轻，要靠专家的眼睛才能看出来。

entry.def: Expert advice or help is given by someone who has studied a subject thoroughly or who is very skilled at a particular job.

example.ex: You'll also get expert advice on keeping your hair in good condition...
example.tran: 你还会获得有关如何保持良好发质的专家建议。
我们需要听听专家的意见。

stems_affixes.value_cn: 凭经验[或观察]的,经验主义的
stems_affixes.word_buile: empiric[n.经验主义者,[古]江湖医生]+al……的→adj.凭经验[或观察]的,经验主义的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 实验的, 根据实验的
stems_affixes.word_buile: experiment实验+al……的→adj.实验的, 根据实验的
ex出+pert=peri尝试→尝试出来→[成为]专家, 行家

stems_affixes.value_cn: 实验上, 用实验方法
stems_affixes.word_buile: experimental实验的+ly……地→adv.实验上, 用实验方法

stems_affixes.value_cn: 经验主义者,[古]江湖医生
stems_affixes.word_buile: em出+piri=peri尝试+c→尝试出来的→经验
empiric[n.经验主义者,[古]江湖医生]+ism主义→n.经验主义
ex出+peri尝试+ment表名词→尝试出来→实验

stems_affixes.value_cn: 实验, 试验, 实验法
stems_affixes.word_buile: experiment[n.实验;试验 v.[on]进行实验;做试验]+ation表名词→n.实验, 试验, 实验法
ex出+pert=peri尝试→尝试出来→[成为]专家, 行家
ex出+peri尝试+ence表名词→尝试出来的东西→经验
ex出+peri尝试+ment表名词→尝试出来→实验
ex出+pert=peri尝试→尝试出来→[成为]专家, 行家

Sentence.sentence: It helps us lower usage at peak power times," says solar expert Mike Keesee.

But the message that everyone must screen for cancer has become so deep-rooted that when health care experts recommended that women under 50 and over 74 stop screening for breast cancer, it caused a riotous reaction among doctors, patients and advocacy groups.
But even before its release, the report drew criticism from some experts on climate and risk, who questioned its methods and conclusions.
Experts see a movement toward the use of mobile technology in education, though they say it is in its infancy as professors try to come up with useful applications.
Some experts say that the rain forest is already at the
Paul Phillips, an expert from the High Field Hospital.

sentences.en: The cook was an expert at making sauces.
sentences.cn: 那位厨师是调制味汁的能手。

sentences.cn: 以她内行的眼光看, 这幅画糟透了。
